name: GM4 Balloon Animals
description: Gamemode 4 datapack that adds balloon animal companions and party-themed mechanics.

build: execute in {world} positioned {forward_x_6_f} {y_f} {forward_z_6_f} rotated {yaw} 0 run function gm4_balloon_animals:build/setup_showcase
execute in {world} positioned {forward_x_6_f} {y_f} {forward_z_6_f} rotated {yaw} 0 run function gm4_balloon_animals:build/populate_showcase
